poisoned at 6:00 a.m. on October 14. Ms.
Pham Thi Phe, 83 years old, lives in Cai Be

not report to the police until 10

mixed by her daughter, she had difficulty breathing and vomited for
about 5 hours.  The next minute he died, his
family did not report to the police,
then about 4:00 a.m. on October 15,
another 55-year-old son of the woman,
after preparing milk to drink, had the same
symptoms as his mother had given him.  I went to the emergency room and the
doctor diagnosed me with a suspicion of
milk poisoning. Currently, the apple harvest season is entering
Belgium, so many

at low prices.  At the same time, promoting the
consumption of the agricultural output of
these localities at the A Me farm,
about 20 km from the Belgian capital Bu, these days
people eagerly come to
harvest ripe apples themselves.
This is my family's farm since
the time my ancestors lived by
growing apples. We are only open two
weekends and last for three weeks so
people can come and harvest. We come
here for our son.  Our kids really like
apples. We eat apples every day. We like to
pick the apples ourselves from the tree
and put them in the basket. These are all
fresh and delicious fruits. This is the method that Am Me farm
is applying to save labor costs.
increase consumption of local fruits and
promote consumption because tourists only have to
pay about 1 Euro or about 26,000 VND
for 1 kg of apples. In addition to direct consumption,
apples are also used to make juice and juice
